/* UserRepository.ListUser */
SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_ACCOUNT, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, IF(EC.QUIT_YMD IS NULL, C.COMPANY_NAME, CONCAT(C.COMPANY_NAME, '(퇴사)')) AS COMPANY_NAME, CD.CODE_NAME AS RANK_CODE_NAME, CD2.CODE_NAME AS JOB_TITLE_CODE_NAME, U.USER_ACTIVE_YN, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(R.ROLE_NAME ORDER BY R.ROLE_ORDER SEPARATOR ', ') FROM CO_USER_ROLE UR INNER JOIN CO_ROLE R ON R.ROLE_ID = UR.ROLE_ID WHERE UR.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS ROLES_STRING FROM CO_USER U
INNER JOIN CO_USER_ROLE UR ON UR.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
INNER JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE E ON E.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE_COMPANY EC ON EC.EMPLOYEE_ID = E.EMPLOYEE_ID AND EC.COMPANY_ID = E.COMPANY_ID AND EC.DELETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN HM_COMPANY C ON C.COMPANY_ID = EC.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = EC.RANK_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'RANK_00' LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD2 ON CD2.CODE_VALUE = EC.JOB_TITLE_CODE AND CD2.UP_CODE_ID = 'JOB_TITLE_00' WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND UR.ROLE_ID IN
@roleId
ORDER BY U.USER_ID DESC

/* UserRepository.GetUser */
SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_ACCOUNT, U.USER_ACTIVE_YN FROM CO_USER U WHERE 1=1 AND U.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND U.USER_ID = @UserId
AND U.USER_ACCOUNT = @UserAccount

/* UserRepository.GetUserLogin */
SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_ACCOUNT, U.USER_PASSWORD, U.USER_ACTIVE_YN FROM CO_USER U WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND U.USER_ACCOUNT = @UserAccount

/* UserRepository.GetUserPassword */
SELECT U.USER_PASSWORD FROM CO_USER U WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND U.USER_ID = @UserId

/* UserRepository.AddUser */
INSERT INTO CO_USER (USER_ACCOUNT, USER_PASSWORD, USER_ACTIVE_YN, CREATER_ID) VALUES (@UserAccount, @UserPassword, @UserActiveYn, @CreaterId) ;SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

/* UserRepository.UpdateUser */
UPDATE CO_USER SET
USER_ACTIVE_YN = @UserActiveYn,
UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE USER_ID = @UserId

/* UserRepository.UpdateUserPassword */
UPDATE CO_USER SET USER_PASSWORD = @NewPassword, UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE USER_ID = @UserId

/* UserRepository.RemoveUser */
UPDATE CO_USER SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE USER_ID = @UserId
